channel.title: How do I change the price of something?
channel.description:
Basically i want to change the price of the p-hats on my server, in store they're 12m ea, ild like them to be a little higher. Can anyone help me out here?
Thanks.

item.title: How do I change the price of something?
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

lol, elite pk source? kk il help
open items.cfg and search for

1038

if it goes to something thats not a phat, click find again until it comes to the phat
you’ll see a bunch of numbers
i.e.

1038  PHAT DESCRIPTION         ####   ####   ####     #  #  #  #  #  #  #  #  #  #  #  #

alright, where all the numbers are, completely delete the second “####” and replace it with the price you want
the second of three numbers == price
the 12 numbers after it are bonuses
you’re welcome =]
oh yeah, save\compile, lol

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the price of something?

item.title: How do I change the price of something?
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

Open item.cfg…

Search the name of the shop…

Find the ID of the party hat…

Change the number after it to the price you want…

Read full topic
